channel.title: Ice Spells
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently working on my ice spells on my server and I can't figure out how to get them to freeze.
If you attack or follow another player while frozen you can move. How do I fix this?
Thanks, Owner of Flamescape

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

ok thanks now can i have your follow and attack voids?

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

public int Freeze = 0;

boolean process() {

if (Freeze > 0) {
Freeze -= 1;
}
case 98: //walk on command
if(Freeze > 0) {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving.");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

Entangle delay is just a variable, its a timer.
For it to work you have to have coding that states if the timer is above 0, then it freezes. This coding is only for setting that timer above 0. This does not freeze people. If you changed it all and gave it all new names, it would only make the timer above 60 but have no effect on movement…

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

No, you see that is what freezes the player. The entangle delay make it so the player cannot move.

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

see now all this does is state that when you barrage, it sets your entangle delay to 60. I want the thing that keeps you from moving while your have an entangle delay above 0

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

public void barrage() { EntangleDelay = 60; }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape

@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

ok what is your barrage void then

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

thats what the entangle void does.

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

yes but this only states that hes frozen this doesn’t apply it, i want the thing that tells the server that if the players if frozen, he can’t move

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

[code] castOnPlayer.barrage();
castOnPlayer.teleportToX = castOnPlayer.absX;
castOnPlayer.teleportToY = castOnPlayer.absY;

[/code]

That is the whole follow and attack thing. Just replace barrage(); with whatever void your using to freeze.

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

ok show me you follow attack and walkto voids now

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Spells
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMsg("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { if (castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay <= 0) { castOnPlayer.barrage(); castOnPlayer.teleportToX = castOnPlayer.absX; castOnPlayer.teleportToY = castOnPlayer.absY; } castOnPlayer.mageHit = 30; castOnPlayer.mageGfx = 369; setAnimation(1979); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); castOnPlayer.sendMsg("You have been frozen!"); sendMsg("You freeze the enemy!"); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMsg("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

That is my ice barrage spell.

here is my void:

public void entangle() { EntangleDelay = 24; }

Read full topic
